result.arabic_text: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
result.translation: 52.Ama korosuk Qaadaa kee taama firqawnaa kce kay maraay keenik duma warreeh Yallih astootil koroosite mari luk suge Qaadaa kee taamah inna, tokkel Yalli usun aben dambitteh sabbatah ken yibbixeeh ken finqiseh, diggah Yalli Qande-li gibdi digaala-li kinni.
